channel.title: Comments on: OverPopulation Is The Real Problem With Energy – We are not sustainable and 6 billion people will have to die

item.title: By: MePregnant
item.dc:creator: MePregnant
item.description:
<strong>Energy Tough Love Blog » OverPopulation Is The Real Problem With ......</strong>
These contrarian stories are based on two recent demographic trends: fertility in nearly all developed nations has fallen below the population-stabilizing “replacement” rate (2.1 children per woman, where mortality is low), ......
item.content:encoded:
Energy Tough Love Blog » OverPopulation Is The Real Problem With ……

These contrarian stories are based on two recent demographic trends: fertility in nearly all developed nations has fallen below the population-stabilizing “replacement” rate (2.1 children per woman, where mortality is low), ……
